div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1436 Asia Minor, c. 1966 Burial: c. 323 B.C. (M) Contents: 52 AR Alexander III: 51 lifetime tetradr. (Amphi- polis 11 ?, Pella 1, Tarsus 7, Myrian- drus 4, Citium 3, Paphus ? 1, Salamis 4, Aradus 3, Byblus 2, Damascus 1, Babylon 9, unc. mints 5) Athens: 1 tetradr. (oriental imit. ?) Disposition: dispersed Information from Peter Franke List of varieties in ANS
